modName: Bunny Protection - Invincible Rabbits and No Dead or Hanging Rabbits
summary:
1) Makes bunnies invincible
2) Disables all handplaced bunny corpses
3) Renames "Rabbit Leg" to "Chicken Leg" and "Rabbit Haunch" to "Roast Chicken Leg"
4) Replaces meshes for hanging bunnies with a blank dummy mesh
descriptionHtml:
Details:
1) Makes bunnies invincible
2) Disables all handplaced bunny corpses
3) Renames "Rabbit Leg" to "Chicken Leg" and "Rabbit Haunch" to "Roast Chicken Leg"
4) Replaces hanging bunnies with a blank dummy mesh

Hearthfire adds an adoptable bunny named Cotton, which this mod makes invincible.
Dragonborn adds one extra handplaced bunny corpse, which this mod removes.
The "legendary" ESP doesn't actually require all the DLC, since Dawnguard only adds two bunnies, both of which are alive and well. Presumably, they will be impacted by the same edit that makes the bunnies in the base game invincible.

Also, while this seems like a simple set of changes, I'm not really too experienced at Skyrim modding, so it's entirely possible that I've screwed something up. Use at your own risk, etc.
author: Chitpickle

files.name: Bunny Protection - Dragonborn
files.changelogHtml: Uses the ESP to point the hanging rabbits to a dummy mesh instead of replacing the meshes themselves
